Author: quinoaslut
Text: I know you’re trying to be helpful, I think most of the people on this page would like to not have an eating disorder. And since you’ve gone thru it and no how bad it is and how manipulative the disorder is, you know saying please stop what you’re doing and eat isn’t really constructive advice. If it were that simple, no one would be dying of this horrible mental illness.   I hope you’re doing better since and on a road to health.
